raw_body: PERERA – CHANDRANI SUNETH – (Retired Commissioner of Probation). It is with great sorrow that the death is announced of CHANDRANI SUNETH PERERA of No. 15/​1,​ off Seram Road,​ Mount Lavinia at the age of 94. She was the only daughter of Ex Senator late Mr M.P. De Zoysa and the mother of D.A.R.D. Dolewatta. Her remains will lie at Jayaratne Funeral Parlour,​ Borella from 10 a.m. to 4.00 p.m. on 14th Oct. 2023. Funeral at the General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4.30 p.m. on the same day. Informant – Mrs D.A.R.D. Dolewatta.064901
